Name: Break Sky
About the game: Game plot: You received a distress signal from a distance, but when you reached this huge spacecraft, no one noticed it. Content and gameplay -The player operator fights with unknown creatures -Collect props -Explore the map Game features: －Real and exciting game mode in the first person. －Tense and terrifying game atmosphere. -Try to survive and escape from this spaceship (The game is currently under development, and some features may not be available temporarily!)
